
=head1 NAME

context

=head1 DESCRIPTION

A context is a subset of terms within a lexicon.

=head1 FIELDS

 lexicon_identifier (character varying) - The lexicon associated with this context.
 identifier (character varying) - A brief descriptive identifier for this context.
 version (character varying) - The version of this context (optional).
 description (character varying) - A description of the context.
 url (character varying) - A url for further information.


=head1 SCHEMA

                                                                 Table "gcis_metadata.context"
        Column       |       Type        |               Modifiers                | Storage  | Stats target |                   Description                    
 --------------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------+----------+--------------+--------------------------------------------------
  lexicon_identifier | character varying | not null                               | extended |              | The lexicon associated with this context.
  identifier         | character varying | not null                               | extended |              | A brief descriptive identifier for this context.
  version            | character varying | not null default ''::character varying | extended |              | The version of this context (optional).
  description        | character varying |                                        | extended |              | A description of the context.
  url                | character varying |                                        | extended |              | A url for further information.
 Indexes:
     "context_pkey" PRIMARY KEY, btree (lexicon_identifier, identifier, version)
 Check constraints:
     "context_identifier_check" CHECK (identifier::text ~ similar_escape('[a-zA-Z0-9:_-]+'::text, NULL::text))
     "context_version_check" CHECK (version::text ~ similar_escape('[a-z0-9_\.-]*'::text, NULL::text))
 Foreign-key constraints:
     "context_lexicon_identifier_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (lexicon_identifier) REFERENCES lexicon(identifier) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Referenced by:
     TABLE "term" CONSTRAINT "term_lexicon_context_version_fkey" FOREIGN KEY (lexicon_identifier, context_identifier, context_version) REFERENCES context(lexicon_identifier, identifier, version) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE
 Triggers:
     audit_trigger_row AFTER INSERT OR DELETE OR UPDATE ON context FOR EACH ROW EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
     audit_trigger_stm AFTER TRUNCATE ON context FOR EACH STATEMENT EXECUTE PROCEDURE audit.if_modified_func('true')
 Has OIDs: no
 

=cut
